item.title: Breaking down the accuracy of preseason rankings
item.description: “Drinking the Kool-Aid” is a phrase all-too-familiar to the Nebraska fan base. It usually begins during the spring, when talk comes out about how the football team is practicing. Fans everywhere buy in and get an idea in their head that we’re going to end the season as conference champions. The 2019 college football season is an excellent example of this for Nebraska. In the preseason AP poll, Nebraska was ranked 24th.
